comments:
Description:
ClassCastException when generate pdf using BIRT PDF emitter from design file with line height setting.

Steps to reproduce:
1. run attached file in bug #118564 to generate pdf through BIRT PDF emitter.

Result:
SEVERE: An error happened while running the report. Cause:
java.lang.ClassCastException
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.css.engine.value.css.LineHeightManager.computeValue(LineHeightManager.java:79)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.css.engine.CSSEngine.resolveStyle(CSSEngine.java:357)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.css.dom.ComputedStyle.getProperty(ComputedStyle.java:47)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.impl.StackingLayoutManager.setLineHeight(StackingLayoutManager.java:83)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.impl.CellLayoutManager.init(CellLayoutManager.java:83)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.impl.StackingLayoutManager.<init>(StackingLayoutManager.java:61)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.impl.InlineBlockLayoutManager.<init>(InlineBlockLayoutManager.java:29)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.impl.CellLayoutManager.<init>(CellLayoutManager.java:38)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.impl.AbstractLayoutEngine.startCell(AbstractLayoutEngine.java:356)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.impl.ReportLayoutEngine.startCell(ReportLayoutEngine.java:196)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.WrappedEmitter.startCell(WrappedEmitter.java:352)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.WrappedEmitter.startCell(WrappedEmitter.java:352)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.DefaultPaginationEmitter.startCell(DefaultPaginationEmitter.java:212)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.GridItemExecutor.executeCell(GridItemExecutor.java:286)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.GridItemExecutor.executeRow(GridItemExecutor.java:229)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.GridItemExecutor.execute(GridItemExecutor.java:144)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutorVisitor.visitGridItem(ReportExecutorVisitor.java:172)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.ir.GridItemDesign.accept(GridItemDesign.java:117)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute(ReportExecutor.java:161)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run(RunAndRenderTask.java:199)
